mapper.select: SELECT sc.*, c.course_name, c.teacher, c.classroom FROM student_course sc LEFT JOIN course c ON sc.course_id = c.course_id WHERE sc.student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY sc.weekday, sc.time_slot

SELECT sc.*, c.course_name, c.teacher, c.classroom FROM student_course sc LEFT JOIN course c ON sc.course_id = c.course_id WHERE sc.student_id = #{studentId} AND sc.weekday = #{weekday} ORDER BY sc.time_slot
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_course (student_id, course_id, weekday, time_slot) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{courseId}, #{weekday}, #{timeSlot})
